assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Inotersen_Initial_RenewalPerameter_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: List patient-specific goals of therapy. For any goal, please list the applicable numerical value/score. NOTE: ANY ONE OF SCORES 1-3 (NORFOLK QOL-DN, R-ODS, OR COMPASS-31) MUST BE PROVIDED. Submission of other scores is not mandatory.
